# Ignore IDE-specific files
.idea/
.vscode/

# Ignore OS-generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Ignore compiled binary files
*.exe
*.dll
*.so
*.dylib

# Ignore log files
*.log

# Ignore dependency directories
node_modules/
vendor/

# Ignore build artifacts
dist/
build/
target/
out/

# Ignore environment variable files
.env
.env.local
.env.*.local

# Ignore temporary files
*.tmp
*.swp
*.swo
*.bak

# Ignore package lock files
package-lock.json
yarn.lock
pnpm-lock.yaml

# Ignore coverage reports
coverage/

# Ignore sensitive files
*.key
*.pem

# Ignore archives
*.zip
*.tar.gz
*.rar
*.7z
